title: Nocturne has no tail, and has not had a tail for over a year for me
body: None of the skins except that mechanical one has a tail for me. Graphics are set as high as possible, and I have a GTX 970 with updated drivers as of December, but this issue has been ongoing for a year through two different videocards and many driver updates.

replies.body:
Nocturne's void/shadow tail? Have you tried running a repair of your game files already? You can initiate a repair from the client menu in the top-right.

Let me know if a repair was helpful in resolving this.
I deleted the Riot Games folder and reinstalled with no change, and I uninstalled through control panel still with no change.

Since you're still seeing issues after repairing your games files, I recommend we escalate this to our tech team. I'd like you to run some system logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get back to you.

If you run into any issues with this, please let me know.

Yes, his shadow tail. Just did a repair today with no luck. Moved graphics to ultra too just in case with no change. 

http://i.imgur.com/b6NGIGj.png

=(
